name: SCStreamFrameInfo
desc: A structure that defines keys you use to retrieve metadata from a frame the system captures.

items.name: static let status: SCStreamFrameInfo
items.desc: A key to retrieve the status of a video frame.

items.name: static let displayTime: SCStreamFrameInfo
items.desc: A key to retrieve the display time of a video frame.

items.name: static let scaleFactor: SCStreamFrameInfo
items.desc: A key to retrieve the scale factor of a video frame.

items.name: static let contentScale: SCStreamFrameInfo
items.desc: A key to retrieve the content scale of a video frame.

items.name: static let contentRect: SCStreamFrameInfo
items.desc: A key to retrieve the content rectangle of a video frame.

items.name: static let dirtyRects: SCStreamFrameInfo
items.desc: A key to retrieve the areas of a video frame that contain changes.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.
